meanings.definition: A unit of force equal to one million dynes.
meanings.sent1: She measured the weight of the object in megadynes.
meanings.sent2: The machine exerted a force of megadynes to lift the heavy load.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's strength was so great that he could easily handle megadynes of force.
meanings.sent4: The impact of the collision felt like megadynes crashing into each other.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake shook the ground with the power of megadynes.

meanings.definition: A force of one million dynes.
meanings.sent1: The rocket engines generated megadynes of thrust to propel the spacecraft into orbit.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the impact force in megadynes to ensure the safety of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful pounce exerted megadynes of force on the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The storm's strong winds felt like megadynes pushing against the windows.
meanings.sent5: The magnet pulled the metal object with the strength of megadynes.
